website_summaries.verdict: Despite some users reporting issues, the long warranty offers peace of mind that some competing manufacturers don't match.
cons: Some quality issues have been found — air leaks, loose plugs, and faulty pumps
Softer and less supportive than others we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: It burst, causing bodily damage
customer_reviews.text: This product failed to live up to its claim that it supports 1000+ pounds and as a result, seriously injured colleague who was doing core chest presses. The ball was only a few months old, and burst, causing two dumbbells to collapse on my colleague and breaking his forearm in two. I called customer service (the number was hard to find) and left a message right after the holidays. I'm now taking the time to flag this product and company and expect/ hope that a representative will contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: **perfect for the obese**
customer_reviews.text: I order the 85 cm black ball over a week ago and I was so afraid of it busting due to my size. I use it everyday without fear and it holds out perfect. I had to pump it up again after the first day due to I didn't have it pumped all the way. This size works perfect for some that is 5'7" and over 280lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Marjory B.

customer_reviews.title: The plastic in this ball reacts with furniture and melts ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic in this ball reacts with furniture and melts away the finish. If the ball is left resting against a dresser, bed, desk, etc., it will leave a nasty sticky mess that when wiped, takes off the protective finish and stain of the furniture. This ball destroys furniture and should be removed from the market. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with their rubber, do not buy until they fix it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 75cm ball in May 2015. It lasted a long time, until April 2018, so almost three years. Very sturdy ball. However, a tear formed in the ball. I called Black Mountain Products at 224-655-5955 on April 23 and received a free replacement. That replacement had a tear in it upon receipt. I called again on April 30th and ordered a second free replacement, which arrived today, May 2nd. This second replacement also has a tear in it. Something has gone very wrong with this company's rubber material. I am done buying their products.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Damages furniture and walls
customer_reviews.text: When the ball rests against a wall, the plastic somehow binds to the wall and when you pull the ball away, you also pull off a piece of your wall paint. This ball has paint spots all over it. It also sat up against furniture and stuck to it, melting the protective coat on the furniture. This has occurred in our workout room in our basement AND it has occurred in our bedroom (third floor with low humidity). I'm not sure why this is happening, but the ball isn't worth it if it's going to ruin certain materials that it rests against.
customer_reviews.author: Searchname

customer_reviews.title: This ball literally exploded with someone sitting on it- suddenly ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball literally exploded with someone sitting on it- suddenly, out of the blue, with no foreign object that anyone could find causing this to happen. Additionally, I've had a different brand ball be impaled with an object while I sat on it- it did NOT explode, it sunk quickly to the ground and caused no injuries. THIS ball caused a hard fall and head smash with its sudden explosion. Don't buy this, find a more reliable ball that won't burst.
customer_reviews.author: Kehr

customer_reviews.title: 55cm in black good for office desk
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is my second ball. The first one I bought was 65cm because I wanted to use it for my desk at work. However, it ended up being too big and my toes barely touched the ground. I recently purchased the 55cm, which is better for sitting at a desk. The black color looks professional, although it does show dirt easily so I usually wipe it down once a week. This ball is very firm when fully inflated- more so than other exercise balls I’ve tried. However, my first ball withstood daily use at the office for 8 hours a day for a year and was still going strong. Great customer service, too!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Spruce

customer_reviews.title: High quality product with easy inflation
customer_reviews.text: Included pump worked well for inflating the ball. Ball has the amount of support and flex I expected based on the manufacturer's recommendations. Pro tips (see photo): Since the recommended circumference (80") is larger then most measuring tapes, measure from the inflation value to the opposite side of the ball, dividing the circumference by 2 (40"). Like on a globe, the opposite side is clearly visible, where all the raised circles on the ball converge. I did the inflation and measuring by myself and used two shoes to brace the ball against the wall as I inflated and measured it.
customer_reviews.author: David Hale

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 investment for parents of baby...not sure about exercise though
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for baby delivery but it wasn't used. i was going to return it when a friend said, just keep it you will use it. boy was she right! between my husband and i we spent hundreds and hundreds of hours bouncing our baby to sleep on this ball for the first 1.5 years or so. it was easy to inflate which is good because i definitely noticed a difference in back pain/relief...when the ball was too low it was harder on our backs. if i get time to exercise i'll update this post....
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Bad!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I purchased this ball to help my back pain during pregnancy and it was a terrible purchase. I used it once and never again. It lost the air soo fast, it was basically useless. I have to inflate it every time I want to use it and have to reinflate every 15 mins or so and that’s just too much work Perhaps I got a bad one?
customer_reviews.author: Karla Felix

customer_reviews.title: Not Cool.... Not cool at all.....
customer_reviews.text: I love sitting on yoga balls for my back. It's so much better than a chair! However, this particular yoga does NOT stand up to 2000 lbs.... or in my case 360 lbs. I'm 6'7" but still... ☹ I had it for less than a month until it popped! Completely embarrassed myself in front of a client and it seriously upset me. I bought it because of the 2000 lb guarantee and I suffered the worst possible outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fool Me Once.... Fool Me Twice
customer_reviews.text: For something that has the words “anti-burst” in the heading of the product description, this is a serious misnomer. The first time I purchased the exercise ball, I hardly used it... and you can imagine my surprise when I came down in the morning to find it had popped overnight. Foolishly thinking that it wouldn’t happen again, I bought it again (I know ... what was I thinking, but the reputation was really good, as were reviews). Again after hardly using it, this time it burst while I was using it. In fact, it made such a loud noise that my wife and son heard it from the floor above me and came downstairs to check on me. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Sean_Dog

customer_reviews.title: The rep from the seller I spoke to was very nice, and sent a replacement
customer_reviews.text: The first ball I received burst while I was filling it with air, yes, I did use a compressor - but I have always used a compressor on the Pezzi balls, and figured this would be OK on these balls too. The rep from the seller I spoke to was very nice, and sent a replacement. The replacement ball burst ball while someone who weighs 250lbs was sitting on it. The ball was maybe 3-months old when it burst, and the person sitting on it was swiftly sitting on the ground once it burst (and was not injured).
customer_reviews.author: Helene P Di Salvo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: The original package did not contain the plug. I contacted BMP directly and they quickly sent replacement plugs. Kuddos to them for fast customer service. Pumped the ball up last week. Enjoyed it for a couple evenings of stretching. Today my 4 year came in with tears of sadness because it had popped. I don't know what happened, but it basically shredded into two pieces. Our last generic ball from Target lasted 5 years. This one only lasted 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dadof5

customer_reviews.title: Choose another provider
customer_reviews.text: There were no inflation instructions. I called the Customer Service number, within working hours, and received voicemail that it was not available. The inflation material was flimsy. The ball did not fit the size as described. I selected Black Mountain because it presented itself as small and family owned. It in fact deals with a huge volume of items. Amazon should not include it as one of its providers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware may cause injury with light use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it not too long ago, pumped to full, left for 24 hours before use. After 1 weeks of light use, it exploded while i was working on it causing quite significant amount of back injury. I am 150lbs, not morbidly obese. Do not recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Leung

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is Legit and Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old is autistic and she bounces on this several times daily for vestibular input. Basically, it helps her regulate her senses. We had this for three years before it popped. Emailed company and they replaced it no questions asked and didn't make us return the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Ball is easy to fill, well constructed, but smaller than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the robustness of the ball and how easy it was to inflate with the bellows provided. The ball feels like gym quality material. However, the item description indicates that the size I purchased, 55 cm, is appropriate for someone between 5 ft and 5 ft, 6 inches in height. I am 5 ft 3 inches and this ball is too small for any exercises that require me to sit on it with my legs out at 90 degrees from my torso. I can still use the ball for some abdominal exercises but I will now need a larger ball as well, and I don’t really have room to store both inflated simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great for Trauma Injuries
customer_reviews.text: It is great to use if you follow a stability ball workout regimen! The only reason this did not get 5 stars across the board is because it took a very long time to inflate. Also the pump that comes with it does not always stay inside the ball when you are trying to pump it up. Once inflated, however, the plug stays in place and does not appear to have any leaks after 1 month. The stability ball really helps with back, neck, and shoulder pain; it's also really good to strengthen your core when you have had severe abdominal trauma like I have.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy M

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I ordered this hoping to replace my desk chair with something more posture-promoting, and maybe get some passive exercise into my day. I think I should have ordered the 55 cm or larger one, but I am under 5 feet tall so I ordered the 45 cm one. My 8-year-old is such a homebody/couch potato but once she set eyes on this thing she was hooked! She uses it at the computer and throughout the day to get her energy out, and she sleeps better than she ever has before. This ball is HERS! Now, I’m off to get my own in the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: egg shaped ball
customer_reviews.text: I used the foot pump that came with this- cheap the plastic broke right away. I did get it pumped up using my old hand one that I had for a prior exercise ball that I had, The ball is filed but is egg shaped and not round. :( very disappointing, Because it is not round it is not going to work for what I need. Do NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Barrott

customer_reviews.title: Love this Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ball, as I had to replace my first ball. After destroying my first ball I was eager to buy a new one. This ball is a life saver. I use if for my back and while watching television. I am 5'9 and this height worked perfectly for me. The only pain was blowing up the ball, but over I love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Elle B

customer_reviews.title: Faulty pump, and possibly mis-sized ball
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the pump they gave me was completely useless. My coworker bought the same exact ball and we compared pumps. Mine didn't even come with a red valve, and the hose was all bent and faulty. Second of all, my coworker got the 65cm ball to sit on, so that's the one I ordered. Somehow hers is significantly bigger than mine, yet they are both labeled 65 cm, exact same B.M.P label. How does that happen? Maybe I got a lemon. Anyways, I would NOT recommend this at all. I'm returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, inexpensive choice for exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an exercise ball to do some stretches and stabilize my abdominal muscles in an effort to alleviate some lower back pain. This product fit the bill. As I am 6'6", I chose the 85 cm size. It is gigantic, but I suppose I am too. The foot pump made it easy to pump up the ball, though because of the ball's size, it took quite some time to pump it up to full size. I have found that stretching and doing exercises on this ball has been helpful in alleviating this pain. Just make sure you know what you are doing so you do not hurt yourself. I have yet to find a fault in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Missing Plugs
customer_reviews.text: I had an exercise ball before just like this that came with white grooved plugs. This ball did not come with any - blew it up thinking perhaps there was some magic to this one and it didn't need a plug...Surprise! All the air just whooshed out of it and since there's shipping delays for everything, I have to wait over a month for a replacement. Also, I just looked at all the reviews that said theirs popped so maybe I just want a refund instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A DeMartini

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as describe and what I needed. My kids literally inflated it for me, without reading the directions. It was that easy! No weird smells, but the pump made a farty sound that made us all giggle. It was recommended by my Physical Therapist for some recovery exercises (I recently had knee surgery) and has been used (without permission) for some rousing games of crab-soccer with the kids. Fun and durable enough for both. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: bakwoodbridge

customer_reviews.title: Original order from a few years ago was best
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product several years ago and have loved it the entire time. Unfortunately, my cat got to it in June and it died. I ordered this same ball again and received a weird defective version that I quickly had Amazon replace. Now even the second one is wonky. The lines bulge in random spots and it doesn't have a round shape when it's inflated. I'm having Amazon replace it one more time and I'm hoping this third one is like my original. If it's not, I'll have to get a refund and switch brands. I'm rooting for you, Black Mountain. I'd give 5 stars if not for the struggle for the old quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not that I know excersize well...
customer_reviews.text: but I do know balls. This exercise ball is holding up well. It's sturdy and comfortable to use. I docked one star because there's no way to keep the pump from falling from the hole or keep half the air from rushing back out while trying to put the plug in (this may not be an issue at all if the have quick hands). And the ball came folded, with spots that looked weak, however, no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: beautifullyderangedmommy

customer_reviews.title: 85cm Great for 6'6"  Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 85cm for my 200 lb., 6'6" husband, as recommended by his doctor. It's been great! Our only trouble is that it doesn't fit through the doorways, so we have to keep it in a big, open area, but that issue is going to happen because of it's size. No troubles with the ball at all. Stays inflated, holds my husband's weight, and has been so helpful with his therapy. We looked at others and found this one to be the best value, too, without compromising quality. We're glad we purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: ForgetMeNot

customer_reviews.title: BMP's are top quality and reliable
customer_reviews.text: As an MS sufferer, I find these stability balls worth their weight in drugs and therapy. I use them at a multitude of different levels of inflation, allowing me to work any and all of my uncooperative limbs and joints with great accuracy. I use the biggest and the 2nd-to-smallest sizes, which accommodates my full range of motion, with bending in all directions. I might be wheelchair bound without their benefits!
customer_reviews.author: W. Swanton

customer_reviews.title: My poor dog--who was lying asleep about a foot away from ...
customer_reviews.text: Quoting from the "Inflating Exercise Ball" instruction pamphlet: "DO NOT UNDER inflate" and later "Pump will not allow ball to be over inflated." The latter statement is utter BS. Imagine my surprise when my 65cm ball, at an inflated circumference of 195cm where there was still appreciable indentation when slight pressure was applied, literally exploded, splitting at the seam. My poor dog--who was lying asleep about a foot away from where I was inflating the ball--is still hiding under a spare bed; who knows when/if he'll ever forgive me. Don't wast your money on this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump broke on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: The ball itself is fine. It is just impossible to get it filled all the way because the pump it came with broke on the 2nd use. If you read the reviews and what it says in the instructions you must be able to fill it twice as it needs time to stretch after filling it the first time. The nozzle broke on second use. The pump really does look like cheap garbage. On an up note it was all only $20 and the ball is really made of great material so it wont pop. I did finally get the ball inflated with a pump that I got for another ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Size Up
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and the 55 cm ball was too small for me (hips under knees when sitting on it) Afterwards, I cross-referenced with other size guides online and they said for me to get a 65 cm. So I take one star off for the size guide not being accurate. Other than that, it's a great quality ball and I appreciate Amazon's return policy as I was able to return it and get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: mldsl

customer_reviews.title: Great for pilates and abs (55cm)
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the 55cm black ball. I measured it and it is roughly 48cm. I read other reviews that this brand balls are smaller and I wanted something between the 45cm and 55cm, so for me, it's perfect size. Packaging was great, a box within an Amazon box, inside came the pump, but it was useless, my lungs worked much better. Overall, looks like it's good quality and perfect for what I wanted it: for pilates and ab exercises. I gave it 4 stars because the size is wrongly advertised. Otherwise, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parra

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but unsure if it will last. Will upgrade when the ball fails
customer_reviews.text: A paper that comes with the ball says the ball has a lifetime of 18 months and should be replaced after that length of time. Will update when the ball bursts or gives in. So far the ball is serving as a desk chair and helps engage core muscles. It seems like the ball might have a small bit of a leak, which could probably be fixed by putting a sealant or oil on the plunger to hold air in the ball. The pump that came with this ball was not sufficient to properly inflate the ball, so I used the tube that came with the pump and blew into it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost exactly 1 year ago. 2 Weeks ago 8/1/2020 the ball popped when I wasn't using it. I use it often so I was heart broke - then I remembered Black Mountain gives a LIFETIME warranty. I emailed them a picture of my original order and the popped ball. I received my new ball yesterday and I'm back in business! It is a great reminder of what good customer service looks like! This is a great company to purchase from - they stand by their products!
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball. I use it as a chair when I'm working long hours at my computer. It is very sturdy and holds up very well and I have no fear of it breaking under me. I feel the difference it makes in my back and leg fatigue, and my muscles feel better now after a long day's work. A really good product. I do wish I would have gotten a smaller size though - I thought that since I'm working at a higher desk I needed a taller ball, so I got the biggest ball size. I'm 5'6", and should have gotten one smaller. However, it still works and I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Popped the First Time my Husband Sat on It
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this particular ball was defective or what, but my husband filled it up according to specifications, and the first time he used it as a "chair" it popped. We sent it back for a refund. We might get the same one again or try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one exercise ball before and sadly found out it was too small for my size. I used the sizing chart for this ball and based on my height this was perfect for me. The pump is a great added feature but it does take a long time to pump the ball the first time with it. It will be much easier to use when all I am using it for is to maintain the pressure. This product is high quality and will last a long time. I am a heavyset guy and it has no issues holding my weight.
customer_reviews.author: pdas980

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, initial surprise at size until fully inflated
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this purchase. I was replacing an old but trusty exercise ball and I took a change on this during prime days. When I first started pumping I was doubtful it was big enough. It seemed decently inflated when still quite small. I persevered with the pump included and it eventually did get to a nice size. After about a week of use I reinflated due to some additional stretch but have not needed to reinflate again. Good bounce and durability. No issues with a weird residue or with stretching on seams. I have been using it on concrete as well as on carpet. Very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Emjai Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I not only wanted an exercise ball for working out but I wanted an exercise ball to use as a desk chair since I've had some back pains sitting in a regular chair. I have nothing but great things to say about this product. It's very sturdy and has helped me with my posture when working at my desk! It has helped me with working out by giving me more options since I do not go to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: High-quality product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, and with *very* complete instructions, a rarity these days. You might think "who needs instructions for an inflatable exercise ball?", but it was actually quite helpful to be told *exactly* what the circumference should be for a properly inflated ball... no guessing at all, just confidence that it was correct! Plus, the company shipped fast and is a very friendly family owned and operated business, just the kind I like to see thriving in the Amazon ecosystem. And a tough, high-quality product to boot. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: The Leitners

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with great customer service. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for physical therapy sessions at home and have been great. Originally I bought the 75 cm ball and it was way too big when inflated. I'm 5'11 and it was just huge for me. So I ordered the 65 cm ball and its perfect. The pump is cheaply made and is already broken. One of the plugs was missing and I wrote an email to Black Mountain and they shipped one immediately for free. I've had it for 5 months now and it has not leaked much air nor has any damage. Great customer service and excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Inwester

customer_reviews.title: Holding up under extreme conditions
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this exercise ball for about 4 years. Recently my grandson discovered it. He likes to sit on it while he plays his video games and bounce up and down vigorously. He is at least a hundred and fifty pounds and I am amazed that this thing has not burst. I've had several other balls that my son popped. The one I bought is black 65 cm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for a desk job and for working out your core!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I highly recommend this for anyone with a desk job. I have a standing desk but wanted to try a stability ball for when I don't want to stand. I LOVE this ball. Not only is it great for my core, I am constantly bouncing or moving about which improves my energy and my circulation and focus. There are so many benefits to having this at my desk. When I want to take a break, I can do some crunches or stretches. Makes a desk job just a little more fun, and keeps the core working!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Quality exercise ball for "chair"
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most durable exercise balls. I purchased one on January 2015 to use as a daily work chair. I am a software engineer and am pleased with the quality and how.much bouncing and daily flopping this "chair" can take. It is now April 2020 and the ball has held up perfectly as a daily chair for the past 5 years!!!! I have purchased 3 others for different heights and to use as chairs or exercise balls. They are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout companion
customer_reviews.text: Perfect workout companion. I ordered this ball to do straight leg rolls and it's the perfect size for this exercise perfect ! It seems strong and was easy to inflate and has held the size and shape well. The ball is made of a heavier material than most other exercise balls I have purchased. I also appreciate that it comes with a foot pump to inflate and doesn't rely on one of the hand pumps. It seems as if it would hold also for someone to sit on. I wish I would have bought my 65 cm ball with this material as I think it will hold up better and retains the shape and inflation better.
customer_reviews.author: Jen L Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This ball was a little difficult to inflate. We found it was faster and easier to use our mouth to inflate it than the pump. The pump isn't working properly, the tube was bent and has a hole in it. But overall, the ball is great! I ordered a larger size since I'm pregnant and on the heavier side and it's really effective to relieve some of my back pain. Really looking forward to using it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: No longer durable
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son uses an exercise ball as a seat/vestibular motion source. He used to love these Black Mountain balls but they seem to be increasingly less durable. This last one lasted 2 months before popping. The one before that lasted 3 months. They used to last a year under the same use conditions. After many years, we are moving on to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent exercise ball - also great "chair" at your desk :)
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement exercise ball for one that our cat punctured :) - I decided to go with the Black Mountain product, as it was the largest size I could find. Both my daughter and I use it to sit on it at our desk as well, and the larger size works best. Needless to say, we love it for exercising as well. It's an excellent product. On the side note, this ball is way shinier - glossy - than our previous ball. My daughter loves that "glow." I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Sebestyen

customer_reviews.title: Yoga ball? More like Yoga Fall.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, used the included pump to fill it. Kept it filled to the correct size (the instructions were very clear on the proper size for inflation). 6 weeks later, it burst. No punctures, no rough handling, simply burst when being used. Honestly can't say I would recommend this to anyone, unless you're a fan of unexpected drops to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Subtle Tales

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball, Right Size!
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga ball.I had been using a smaller ball for WAY too long, because I was not aware there were size appropriate balls. Black mountain offered a great product, appropriate to my height; I am 6' tall and use it for workout and as a sewing chair, and my partner, 6' 4", uses it to rehab a shoulder reconstruction. What a difference using a larger ball makes! BMP included clear, concise instructions for inflation. The ball is easy to inflate and tough enough for rough use. It arrived quickly and we put it to use immediately. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Polymathena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have been using this as a desk chair* for a few months and it has held up very well. I was a little concerned with the texture of the ball upon opening, but the "stickiness" was most likely from being tightly compressed and dissipated when the ball was inflated. As other reviewers have stated, make sure to give the ball time to inflate properly. The first inflation will stretch the material, and the second will allow you get the proper fill. Overall, a great purchase. *Desk chair details: I am 5'7" and have a sit-stand station that is 30" from the ground at the lowest height. I chose the 75" ball and it has fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa CJ

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: March 18 - Ordered March 20 - Delivered May 31 - Return window closed June 1 - BURST. Yes, properly inflated. Always felt too soft. Just buy the original "G" brand.
customer_reviews.author: HKHeidemann

customer_reviews.title: Solid product with attention to minute details in packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball for my wife to use during her pregnancy. We've been using all day everyday for almost two to three weeks now and it is a very solid product. The product packaging was thorough with attention to detail for even minute things like having a plucker to remove the air stopper. On previous such purchases I would frequently end up damaging my nails trying to get the stopper out of the ball. The air pump included with the ball was also extremely convenient as we could use it by stepping on it as opposed to a hand pump which can be taxing on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: one mallu dude

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my wife but now I use it most of the time!
customer_reviews.text: I am a bigger guy, and as such I broke my old computer chair. I have since replaced it with this ball and my back feels better than ever, I am building my core, and it's actually quite a bit more comfortable than I ever thought it would be to use as a chair replacement! I don't have to worry about it breaking, either, as it has a strength of more than 2,000 lbs. If you're looking for a great, tough Swiss ball at a fantastic price, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Too small.  Read carefully, its important to order the size right for you.
customer_reviews.text: You must take care to order a ball that is right for your size. Unfortunately, this is not made clear in the up-front reading when you look at this product. We have to return it. What a pain! Decided to go with an exercise bench instead of the ball. In our case, the small size lead to a negative experience, which could have been avoided; if the importance of size to individual had been made very clear upfront.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great for lower back pain!
customer_reviews.text: Sitting on this as I type this review! 5'10", and use this as my office chair. It has survived all day, every day use since I bought it, as well as a long distance move. I don't buy into the idea of getting abs from sitting on one of these, but it has definitely helped my lower back! If I don't sit on this, my back hurts by the end of the day. Plus, some light bouncing does help if I'm feeling antsy but can't go for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and efficient. I love that the pump comes with it. We purchased this for use in my daughter's class in place of a desk chair. It's so great to see these fidgety kids sitting on exercise balls, working their core muscles and having an outlet for their fidgets so they can pay attention. And it's pink, my second-grader's favorite color! This seems to be the most durable brand, a few other low-cost balls have popped already this year, but the kids with Black Mountain yoga balls are still doing great.
customer_reviews.author: QBee

customer_reviews.title: I've used it for several workouts now and I absolutely love it. Very well made
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical. I'd inflated the ball to what I believed was full capacity, and it was very small, but I read some of the other reviews and decided to let the ball stretch out over night and inflate it again a little more the next day. When I checked out the ball the next morning it was noticeably bigger. Basically you have to continue to inflate it gradually as the rubber stretches out until it measures what it's supposed to in circumference. I've used it for several workouts now and I absolutely love it. Very well made, and I'm a big fan of Black Mountain products.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom 🐱Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Several websites recommended the 55 cm ball for my height
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then advertised. My husband's exercise ball was way too bag and hard for me to balance on while doing core exercises. Several websites recommended the 55 cm ball for my height. I bought the black 55 cm ball, and fully inflated it's only about 42 cm in diameter. My trainer laughed when she saw this. On the bright side it seems sturdy, had fast shipping, came with two plugs and was easy to inflate with the foot pump. Huge hassle to have to return this now and have to shop around again.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: As I type this review, I sit on the very ball in focus! I do appreciate this product; it has allowed me to up my activity levels since I can keep my core, legs, and hips active while I sit. The product has enabled me to make a significant change in my life, and I appreciate that. Also, at first, I received a poor ball that deflated within a week, and BMP sent another one free of charge–GREAT customer service with Black Mountain Products. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Pain relieving miracle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stability ball for work since I am sitting almost half of my day. Its hard to keep your core tight the whole time, but its a great challenge! I had back surgery at 15, now I have a bulging disc at 23, so I'm always living life with lower back/tailbone pain. Sitting on the ball compared to sitting in a company chair was a HUGE improvement. Now I've got one for work and one for home. I would recommend this to anyone. Buy a bigger one for desks at work. I'm 5'4, but I bought the biggest possible for work. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Williams

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pain to inflate with the crappy pump you are given. I had another yoga ball for years that I, regretfully, gave away. This barely holds a candle to it. The material seems thin to me. I get that it has a low price point, but so did my first yoga ball. So maybe they just don't make them like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are smaller than suggested.
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered a 55, because it says for people up to 5'6. I am 5'5, and the 55 was too small for me. I exchanged it for a 65, and that one is the perfect size. I feel completely comfortable on the ball. It doesn't slip on my floor and is supportive. I took off 1 star due to the sizing issue I had with the ball. It also takes a very LONG time to pump up with the included pump. I'd recommend an air compressor or plug in inflator to do the job much faster! Overall, I am pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: vecca

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy ball works well as a seat
customer_reviews.text: This ball is excellent for balance exercises while sitting, used with the stabilizer ring. I find it very comfortable using it while on my computer! My only complaint is that it is very, very hard to fill, using the provided hand pump. You have to cover one nozzle while pumping (hard) and I wasn't able to get it to the full 26" size. However with help we got it to 25" which was fine for me; at that diameter it is a very, very firm surface, again useful for sitting. For various exercises, I need to release a lot of air so that the ball gives when compressed and provides proper resistance.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moe

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, easily blows up and feels very secure. I used it during my daughters labor and it brought a lot of comfort and security. Also helped my back to sit on during pregnancy. It's a great size and fits my height accurately according to their chart. Comes with 2 plugs which is awesome in case you loose one and a tool to pull out the pulg which you want to deflate and store which is very handy! Easy to follow directions. I'll definitely be using it for postpartum exercises.
customer_reviews.author: HRod

customer_reviews.title: Shaped like an egg
customer_reviews.text: It seems like some what decent quality and it was very easy to inflate but it turned out to be more of an egg shape than an actual ball. I didnt expect a perfect circle but what i got doesnt seem right. I have to be right in the center for it not to try and roll to one side or another. I expected it to correct itself after a month or two but it hasnt
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Sizing seems off...
customer_reviews.text: Badger Boy's wife's review: I ordered the size 65 ball but it doesn't seem like the correct size. I pumped it completely and a few days later, let out some air and pumped it again hoping it would stretch; however, it still isn't truly a size 65 ball. My coworkers and I all use exercise balls for chairs. They purchased theirs at different retail stores (and are different brands) and theirs are all the same size but mine looks like it is the mini-version... Very strange. The material of this ball is a lot smoother and stiffer than theirs (which is more grippy and softer). It'll do the job but it wasn't what I expected...
customer_reviews.author: MSN

customer_reviews.title: Good as a Desk Chair For a Bigger Guy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a desk chair. Good quality product I'm 6'4 250 and bought the 75mm ball fits perfectly. Customer service was very nice when I had a question about a promotional item. The only complaints would be that you have to inflate it manually and takes about 20 min to get it fully inflated also make sure you have a cloth tape measure as you will need to measure the circumference to know if you've inflated it enough. I'm still giving it five stars because for all I know this could be standard when buying an exercise ball. BTW the 75mm size will not fit through a standard door way fully inflated. Plan your inflation strategy carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Drew R. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: It helps relieve some of my pains
customer_reviews.text: I never had an exercise ball nor have I used one in the past. I purchased the size that best fit my height. It was smaller than what I thought it should be. My purpose was to help ease my pains due to scoliosis and arthritis. I only have used it 4 times and it seems to help so far. I can't speak for the quality since I have nothing to compare it with. There is a rubbery smell that is strong and annoying but I am guessing the smell will go away eventually. I do not like the pump that it came with but it will do. For the price, it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chippendales

customer_reviews.title: has small whole after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball about a month ago and had used it lightly for prenatal exercise and had planned to use it for labor. Unfortunately, there's a small hole in it already. The ball holds air but obviously not usable. I've contacted the company to see if it's possible to get a patch kit as I'd hate to throw this item in the landfill after such a short amount of time. The ball worked great before. . .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This is great!! Came well within the specified delivery time ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! Came well within the specified delivery time and it has now been used for over a week. I have substituted this stability ball for my easy boy chair and my body is thanking me. The ball is well made, the instructions for inflation are clear and concise, the pump that came with these balls is more than sufficient for inflating the ball. I am very happy with this purchase, so happy that I have ordered three more in varying sizes for the rest of my family to use and improve their posture and core strength. Check online for workouts with the stability ball, many are available for free and this really does wonders for your core strength.
customer_reviews.author: MarkM

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as it should
customer_reviews.text: Bought this balance ball last April, and it's still going strong. Should have probably bought one size down, but that's my own mistake. Good: easy to adjust level of inflation (once you're already base-level inflated). Holds air very well. It's been 10 months and I only had to top off once. As comfortable as a balance can be, I guess :) No so good: the included foot pump takes a long time and is squeaky. As in - no way I can pump up this ball in my open plan office - had to go hide in the conference room for 20 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our engineer uses it for his office chair. Update - I have 3 engineers that use this for their office chair. Today one of them burst into 2 pieces. He wasn't hurt. We did check the floor and didn't find anything on the floor and nothing in his back pocket that would have caused a tear. I'm not sure what caused this since it was rated up to 2000lb. For that reason, I'm lowering to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leatherman

customer_reviews.title: Therapy Ball
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist recommended this ball for me. It has most definitely stood the test for time and endurance. I've had mine for almost five years, used it almost every day, and have yet to put air in it. It has held up and remains in excellent condition. It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and it does require good posture to use.
customer_reviews.text: The pump would take forever to initially inflate the ball. However it can work to keep the ball inflated. The ball itself is great. I weigh 270 and it is heavy duty enough for me. The ball shape does distort to sort of an oval...but that keeps it from being unstable when you sit on it. I ordered a 2nd one to have at my work. It does force to you to get up from it once in a while because you can't spend as long a time sitting on it as you can a comfy leather office chair. Mine seems to hold air better after a couple weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: facile

customer_reviews.title: Unfortuantely it Actually Isn't Anti-Burst
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my office. It was great quality, perfect for my desk, and easy to inflate. Unfortunately, two weeks later it popped right underneath me. I'm 5'5". 140lbs soak and wet and I hit the floor pretty hard. Maybe this particular one was defective and that's the reason for the burst. I really wanted this one to work as the ball was the perfect size for the office and felt like the perfect quality. I contacted the POC for BMP and let them know what happened. They were very responsive and issued me a refund. They even offered the option of a refund or their advanced ball.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda B

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect buy! I use it mostly as a chair while playing some video games or working on the computer since I spend a lot of time sitting at one. It took some time to get used to and to get the right size for my height, I am 5'9" so I got the 65cm ball. The pump is more effective if you use your foot. It can be a bit noisy and squeaky. If you are looking for a exercise ball or simply to replace your desk chair I would recommend this highly. My friend came over to watch TV and ended up sitting on this instead of the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert John

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pump and holds air well. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to inflate with approximately 20 minutes of pumping air with the given inflating apparatus (nozzle and pump). Been using in place of a chair at my desk, as well as light exercise use, with no dramatic air loss. Probably will need to do a minor reinflation in a couple weeks (once a month). Little to no plastic smell or odor after the first few hours. The texture of the material gives a slightly grippy feel, good for exercise, yet should give no troubles for a quick routine cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Cygnus42

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct size
customer_reviews.text: 85cm, not even close. I pumped this thing up as much as I could while keeping it far from breaking. 71.25 cm is the actual size. If I wanted a 70cm ball I would have purchased one. It is labeled 85cm, so I wasn't sent the wrong one. it's 28 inches not 33.5. FYI. I know that I've been lied to all my life but I know when 6 inches falls short
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rocwkell

customer_reviews.title: The last exercise ball you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best exercise ball I've ever purchased. I bought this to use in the office and often go back and forth between it and my chair. After the initial inflation adjustment period I have yet to have to refill it in 2.5 years! I bounce on it a lot at my desk (and I'm definitely not a "light" person). They could honestly charge double the price for this ball and you'd still get your money's worth. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Do recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this ball for several months now, and it's been wonderful to me! While I unfortunately don't use it for exercise (as there is too little room in my room to do so), as a chair it's been great for my lower back. I have a herniated disk, and as a programmer I sit for long periods of time. Add the two together and unsurprisingly I get a pain in my lower back after sitting for a while, even with me getting up to walk around every 10 minutes or so. With this ball, it's never been the case, and for that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Law

customer_reviews.title: It's smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than expected. I bought a 75cm from Target in February and some how it got a hole so I bought this one thinking it would be the second size. Nope, it was maybe a third of the size. If I could have kept the other inflated I would have done a side by side. Also, my son was terrified by the ball not sure why but every time he saw it he cried and ran away from it. So it had to go. But I was able to return it and get a refund so I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin Ducky

customer_reviews.title: This ball is less than a half the cost of balls that it is better than.
customer_reviews.text: I randomly bought exercise balls off of Amazon without giving it much thought. This was until two of them bursts. I stand on my exercise balls sometimes (no joke), so I strongly prefer them to be dependable. When my second balls bursts , I started doing some research and I learned a lot about how to evaluate these exercise balls. This ball is of exceptional quality. Almost amazingly so. What is weird is the price. This ball is less than a half the cost of balls that it is better than. I forgot to mention....I ended buying two of these balls because they are so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Top quality stability ball at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic stability ball. The instructions included made it easy to inflate using the included pump which is of high quality. I immediately noticed when first opening the package that the rubber the ball is made from is thicker than most stability balls and clearly can hold a great deal of pressure. I was able to inflate the ball and use it in just a few minutes. This is a higher quality ball than I have used before and without a doubt better than the ones at the gym I go to. Have to mention as well that at the price paid it is an absolute bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Watson

customer_reviews.title: Will serve its purpose fine but came looking gross
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality ball and will serve it's purpose as an exercise ball fine; however, I'm disappointed in how dirty it was when I took it out of the packaging. I don't know what's on it but it's gross. I had to clean the ball when it really should have already looked clean and brand new when I received it. The pump is also very cheap. A few minutes into using it, it started to leak air. But I did manage to get the ball blown up. Overall, fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Big man on a big yoga ball
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'6" 270 lbs. I didn't know they made yoga balls for folk of my category. Black Mountain Products explained all of that on their page and recommended a proper ball size based on my height. Package came in on time from the continental US. What was nice was that in the package BMP also included instructions for filling the yoga ball and what the proper inflation measurements should be. I've had this ball for a few weeks now. I sit on it at my desk. Perform rigorous exercises and bounce on it like a large child. It truly is tested for 2200 LBS of static weight. Would recommend and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: 2000 lbs, isn't that the size of a small car?
customer_reviews.text: So I've never really liked exercising. I wanted something I could do at home that wasn't some huge investment in money or space. I learned about exercise balls from a bariatric class, but I wasn't sure I'd find one that would bear my weight. This ball takes my weight, plus some. Just sitting on it I can feel core muscles working. Core strength is important and stabilizing myself while I excercise definitely works those muscles. I have been using it for a month and I already feel a difference. I find I'm more energetic and can exercise longer without as many breaks as before.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great as an office chair!
customer_reviews.text: As I write this, I'm at the office sitting on this ball. As the other reviews noted, you'll have to pump it up, sit on it, pump it up again, until it's stretched out. I sit on this most of the day at the office and simply feel better when I sit on this than the garbage chairs they have 'round here. I'm 6'2" and bought the black 85 cm and it's a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: TxCrash

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exercise/balance ball several months ago and I am completely satisfied with it. Great product for the money. The foot pump was a little difficult to keep in place while inflating it initially, but it did the trick. The ball has held up nicely. It has kept it's shape without any weak spots. I use it for balance exercises and light weight-lifting.
customer_reviews.author: amazon Allie

customer_reviews.title: Decent feeling ball, terrible pump.
customer_reviews.text: The ball may be ok, no way to know how long it will last. The pump however is a total joke. That pos blew apart in seconds. The instructions say to only use the pump that came with the ball to fill it, so you’re gonna have to go off book here.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ball takes abuse
customer_reviews.text: I'm feeling confident that this ball won't burst! My BIG nephew bounced on it so hard I thought it was an ER trip in the making - either he was going to fall off and crack his head, or the ball would burst and he'd crack his head. The ball was fine, and so was he. I wanted to use our compressor to fill it, because I got the biggest size and thought it'd take forever, but the instructions specifically said not to because the compressor air is too cold. It didn't take long to fill with the enclosed foot inflator, but it was a little bit of exercise in itself. So far, I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DetroitV

customer_reviews.title: It's good so far
customer_reviews.text: Im 6'4" 195lb and got a 75cm ball as a work desk chair and to do some exercises. About a month of daily use and so far so good. A couple of things i would point out, the red is not a vibrant as it looks in the picture, and if the ball sits next to a wall for a while it will get a bit of paint stuck to it.
customer_reviews.author: YA

customer_reviews.title: These balls are sturdy, hold air very well
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 3 Black Mountain Exercise Balls, all size 65. The first was for me. The next 2 were for our granddaughters, ages 8 and 11. These balls are sturdy, hold air very well, provide dynamic seating and exercise fun for all of us, and come in a variety of colors. Each ball includes a plastic air pump which is surprisingly easy to use and efficient at blowing up the ball. Thanks to Black Mountain for making an excellent product and offering it at an affordable price. These balls make wonderful gifts for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I choose the 55cm one, blew it up in a few minutes to full size. im 5'3, 5'5 with my workout shoes on and its the perfect size. I have a permanent thigh knee injury and its hard for me to do stretches and moves. this makes it so easy and i trust BMP because ive used their products for nearly three years with no problems. i had no problem hopping right on and im 214 right now. LOVE IT. it comes with the pump and some replacement valve holders. as well as a valve remover. i just used a flat screwdriver because the remover was useless.
customer_reviews.author: lisajaquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, sturdy but odd texture.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for labor and delivery of my baby. This particular exercise ball isn't as grippy and matte as the ones I see at the gym - it's slick and shiny and plastic-y feeling. I disliked that aspect of it. However, it held together, held my weight, and the little air stopper piece didn't pop out despite me going through labor after sitting on it for three months on and off and despite it taking plenty of abuse. It comes with an extra air stopper piece and pump, took a while to blow up, but it didn't stretch out and require re-inflating after it was initially inflated. Great ball for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pooky

customer_reviews.title: Popped
customer_reviews.text: Popped while I was using it. Its not a long fall but it still hurt when I landing on my back. I have owned it for about 8 months but it sat in the box for at least 2 months before we filled it up with air. I made sure to follow the instructions when filling it each time and used the pump that came with the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect chair, but that's the idea...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one to sit on while in my office at work. I've read somewhere that it helps to strengthen your core. I guess it does, or so it seems - I do other things. It holds air pretty well - only had to pump it up once since I got it a few months ago. One irritating thing - it is not perfectly round. It is a bit egg-like shaped, so it does not stay where you left it - it sort of roams around until it settles. On the other hand it may make you work a bit harder trying to balance yourself on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second ball I've purchased from black mountain. I love the price, you can't beat it. I've had my first one and it's held up well and is still in perfect condition. I bought a second one to use at work and it's helped a lot with lower back pain
customer_reviews.author: michelletmommyTop Contributor: Baby

product_meta.title: Black Mountain Products 2000lbs Static Strength Exercise Stability Ball with Pump
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL GRADE - Exercise and stretching balance ball for all ages
2001 POUNDS OF WEIGHT - B.M.P has created a strong holding balancing ball that holds up to a ton of weight
INCLUDES - Comes with a ball pump and a starter brochure to help first time users
MANUFACTURER WARRANTY - B.M.P exercise balls come with manufactures warranty to ensure safety
SIZE OPTIONS - 45cm (5′ and under) 55 cm (5′ to 5′ 6″ tall) 65 cm (5’6″ to 6′ tall) and 75 cm (6′ to 6 5″) and 85cm (6′ 5″ or taller)
